Package com.siperian.sif.message.hm

Provides request and response objects for Siperian Hub Hierarchy Manager APIs.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ModifyRelationshipRequest  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddRelationshipRequest
    Add a new Relationship/effective period for an existing relationship.
    AddRelationshipResponse
    This is the response to an AddRelationshipRequest.
    DeleteRelationshipRequest
    Delete a Relationship between two Entities.
    DeleteRelationshipResponse
    This is a response to the DeleteRelationshipRequest.
    EntityFilterCriteria
    This is the filter criteria for GetOneHopRequest and also EntityGraphFilter.
    EntityGraphFilter
    This is the filter criteria for GetEntityGraphRequest.
    EntityInfo
    This object provides additional information about an Entity Record that is returned in the GetEntityGraphResponse.
    GetEntityGraphRequest
    Fetch a list of Relationships and Entities that represent the graph of Entities related to the Entities in the request.
    GetEntityGraphResponse
    This is a response to the GetEntityGraphRequest.
    GetOneHopRequest
    Fetch one level of Relationships and related Entities for the Entities specified in the request.
    GetOneHopResponse
    This is the response to a GetOneHopRequest.
    HMRecord  
    OneHopFilter
    This is the filter criteria for GetOneHopRequest and also the base class for EntityGraphFilter.
    RelationshipRequestBase
    This is the base class for Add, Update and Delete Relationship requests.
    SearchHmQueryRequest
    This request is used to search HM Entities or Relationships.
    SearchHmQueryResponse
    This is a response for the SearchHmQueryRequest.
    SiperianObjectRecordKey
    This key is a combination of a RecordKey and a SiperianObjectUid and identifies an Entity.
    UpdateRelationshipRequest
    Update a Relationship between two Entities.
    UpdateRelationshipResponse
    This is a response to the UpdateRelationshipRequest.

Package com.siperian.sif.message.hm Description

Provides request and response objects for Siperian Hub Hierarchy Manager APIs.
